item.title: Kioptrix 2
item.description: Kioptrix 2 1. Enumeration URL: https://www.vulnhub.com/entry/kioptrix-level-11-2,23/ Desc: Kioptrix 2 is exploited using SQL Injection and a reverse shell and Root is gained by a Linux Kernel Exploit.

item.title: Kioptrix 1
item.description: Kioptrix 1 URL: https://www.vulnhub.com/entry/kioptrix-level-1-1,22/ Desc: Kioptrix Level 1 is an easy boot to root machine, it can be exploited using multiple vulnerabilities a few of which have been demonstrated below
